mapper.sql:
SELECT A.acctId ,A.acctNm ,A.acctGrpCd ,(SELECT acctGrpNm FROM AcctGrpTbl WHERE acctGrpCd = A.acctGrpCd) as acctGrpNm ,A.acctSt ,A.deptNm ,A.oflvNm ,A.acctPw ,A.mobile ,A.telephone ,A.email ,A.regr ,(SELECT acctNm FROM AcctTbl WHERE acctId = A.regr) AS regrNm ,A.regDtime ,A.modr ,A.modDtime ,A.latestDtime ,(SELECT acctPrntCd FROM AcctGrpTbl WHERE acctGrpCd = A.acctGrpCd) as authGrp FROM AcctTbl A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.acctId = #{acctId}
AND A.acctGrpCd IN (SELECT acctGrpCd FROM AcctGrpTbl WHERE acctPrntCd = #{authGrp})
AND A.acctGrpCd = #{acctGrpCd}
AND acctNm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ acctNm }, '%')
AND A.acctNm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchWord }, '%')
AND A.deptNm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchWord }, '%')
AND A.oflvNm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchWord }, '%')
AND A.acctSt != 9
mapper.select: SELECT A.acctGrpCd ,A.acctGrpNm ,A.acctPrmsMenus ,A.acctGrpDesc ,A.acctPrntCd ,A.regr ,(SELECT acctNm FROM AcctTbl WHERE acctId = A.regr) AS regrNm ,A.regDtime ,A.modr ,A.modDtime FROM AcctGrpTbl A WHERE A.acctGrpCd = #{acctGrpCd}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO AcctGrpTbl( acctGrpNm, acctGrpDesc, acctPrmsMenus, acctPrntCd, regr, regDtime, modr, modDtime) VALUES ( #{acctGrpNm}, #{acctGrpDesc}, #{acctPrmsMenus}, #{acctPrntCd}, #{regr}, #{regDtime}, #{modr}, #{modDtime})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS acctGrpCd
mapper.update: UPDATE AcctGrpTbl SET acctGrpNm = #{acctGrpNm}, acctGrpDesc = #{acctGrpDesc}, acctPrmsMenus = #{acctPrmsMenus}, acctPrntCd = #{acctPrntCd}, modr = #{modr}, modDtime = #{modDtime} WHERE acctGrpCd = #{acctGrpCd}
